section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Euro Guarantees Group is an independent, English Group, with a strong international presence. Established in 2015, it is among the world’s leading insurers and it is present in over 20 countries. The Group has a leading position in Western Europe and an increasingly significant presence in the markets of Central and Eastern Europe and Middle East.
